definition: thick and heavy in colors/to describe sth in colorful language with attention to detail (idiom)
ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead
surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico

sentences.english: The article describes Chang'an's prosperity in the Tang dynasty in a rich and colorful manner.
sentences.chinese: 這篇文章濃墨重彩地描寫了唐長安城的繁華。

sentences.english: In the past several years, OLY people made many colourful cantos .
sentences.chinese: 過去的幾年中，奧菱人留下了許多濃墨重彩的篇章。
